item.title: Changelog
item.description: All notable changes to this package will be documented in this file. The format is based on Keep a Changelog, and this project adheres to Semantic Versioning.

item.title: Roadmap
item.description: An overview of the features I‚Äôm currently working on. If you have any feature requests, feel free to reach out here Contact. I‚Äôm always open to suggestions.

item.title: Performance
item.description: Some best-practices and guidelines when it comes to performance. Tip! Use the Profiler and Frame Debugger The Profiler and Frame Debugger are invaluable tools to get an insight in the rendering process of your project.

item.title: Contact
item.description: How to get in touch. Hi! I am Alexander, the developer of Linework. You can reach me in the following ways: Discord: discord.com/invite/cFfQGzQdPn Twitter: @alexanderameye Email: alexanderameye@gmail.com Website: ameye.dev.

item.title: Compatibility
item.description: Will Linework work together with your project? Compatibility Linework is compatible with Unity 6 and the Universal Render Pipeline. Other combinations are not supported.

item.title: Wide Outline
item.description: Wide Outline renders an outline by generating a signed distance field (SDF) for each object and then sampling it. This creates consistent outlines that smoothly follows the shape of an object.

item.title: Surface Fill
item.description: Surface Fill renders fills by rendering an object with a fill material. Configuration The Surface Fill Settings object contains the settings related to this fill effect.

item.title: Soft Outline
item.description: Soft Outline renders outlines by generating a silhouette of an object and applying a dilation/blur effect, resulting in smooth, soft-edged contours around objects ...

item.title: Fast Outline
item.description: Fast Outline renders outlines by rendering an extruded version of an object behind the original object. Advantages Performance: Not a screen-space effect, just re-renders the object with a simple shader.
